name: Castle Defense (itch) (INshadow)
description:
far far east country
you can play as a blue guys, or as a red ones.
the blue ones are defenders of the castle
and the red ones going to blow it up completely

Q and E to turn camera

press and drag figures by left mouse button

right mouse button cancelling current selection

blue wins if all reds are pushed away from the board
red wins if blue castle is destroyed

reds has jihad guys who can damage the castle

new soldiers spawn by time
